about.bio: Developer passionate about technology and innovation, specialized in React, Node.js and modern web application development.
about.journeyText: My journey started with email templates and evolved to complex cloud applications. I have a passion for creating exceptional user experiences and maintainable code.
about.longBio:
I'm a full stack developer with over 3 years of experience in web and mobile application development.

My passion for technology began during my Computer Science degree, where I discovered the power of transforming ideas into functional digital solutions.

I specialize in modern technologies like React, Next.js, TypeScript and Node.js, always seeking best practices and development patterns. I have experience in developing scalable applications, RESTful APIs and database integration.

Besides development, I'm interested in UX/UI Design and always seek to create digital experiences that are both functional and visually appealing.

I'm always looking for new challenges and opportunities to grow professionally, contributing to innovative projects that make a difference.

descriptions.techcorp: Web and mobile application development, technical team leadership and scalable systems architecture.
descriptions.startupxyz: Responsive user interface development and React application performance optimization.
descriptions.freelancer: Website and web application development for diverse clients, from landing pages to complete systems.
descriptions.on2dex01: Development of pages and components for Toyota Brazil & Argentina portal
descriptions.aceleradora: Social projects and innovative solution development
descriptions.freelancerTemplates: Email templates, institutional websites and mobile prototypes
descriptions.leef: Web application development with React, Node.js and API integration

descriptions.usp: Solid foundation in computer fundamentals, algorithms, data structures and software development.
descriptions.rocketseat: Intensive bootcamp focused on React, Node.js and modern application development.

descriptions.toyotaBrasil: Toyota Brazil institutional portal with modern and responsive interface
descriptions.toyotaArgentina: Toyota Argentina institutional website with responsive design
descriptions.kintoBrasil: Kinto urban mobility platform in Brazil
descriptions.descarteCerto: My first project as a developer - the beginning of my journey in technology. Social project focused on sustainability and conscious material disposal.

longDescriptions.toyotaBrasil: Development of pages and components for the official Toyota Brazil portal, focusing on performance, accessibility and user experience.
longDescriptions.toyotaArgentina: Contribution to the development of Toyota Argentina portal, maintaining visual and functional consistency with the brand's international standards.
longDescriptions.toyotaVenezuela: Development and maintenance of Toyota Venezuela institutional website, adapted to the local market with focus on user experience.
longDescriptions.kintoBrasil: Development of Kinto Mobility Brazil digital platform, Toyota's urban mobility service, focusing on sustainable transport solutions.
longDescriptions.kintoArgentina: Development of contact page and interactive forms for Kinto Mobility Argentina, optimized for conversion and user experience.
longDescriptions.alright: Development of Alright institutional website, consulting specialized in digital transformation and technological solutions for companies.
longDescriptions.cruzVermelha: Development of digital platform for Red Cross humanitarian coverage, facilitating access to information and resources for vulnerable communities.
longDescriptions.descarteCerto: This was my first project as a developer, marking the beginning of my journey in technology. Social project from Aceleradora Ágil focused on sustainability, where I learned the fundamentals of web development. Integration with geolocation APIs, complex forms and interactive maps to facilitate conscious material disposal. A transformative experience that defined my passion for programming.
